name: PlatformCreator01
success: Form has been successfully submitted. Thank you.

config.default:
You will be asked to create a crowd marketplace (e.g., like Uber or Amazon Mechanical Turk) using our system. We will provide a description of the crowd market we want you to create and you will complete forms on our platform to start to create this marketplace. The forms will ask you to customize and create a crowd market following the described above. It is important to complete the forms carefully, especially think about how your selected options could affect the overall design of the crowd market you will create. If an option in the forms is not present specified in the description, try to infer the answer based on what you are trying to create.

Crowd Market Description: You need to build a crowd market that focuses on delivering rides through an app. The crowd market will connect people who need a ride (passengers) with people who can offer a ride (drivers). This crowd market will offer two main services: X, that are rides from drivers who drive a non-luxury vehicle and Black that are provided from drivers who drive luxury vehicles. The crowd market will charge passengers a fee calculated by our platform once the service has ended. The Crowd market platform will take a percentage for every ride income and the rest will go to the driver. The service is available only in some cities and countries.

Terminology:
Crowd market/marketplace: Platform that connects people who have something to offer with people who need it. These can be commercial where money is the payment or non-commercial for barters, volunteering and other type of transactions not based in money.

Click on Next to start

<script>
var userId = uuidv4();

jQuery(function(){
  jQuery('body').on('DOMNodeInserted', '.fillable', function(e) {
    if (e.target.tagName != "LABEL") {
      gigConnectFields(this);
    }
  });
  jQuery(".fillable").each(function(){
    gigConnectFields(this);
  });
  jQuery(".trackable").focusin(function(){
    ga('send', {
      hitType: 'event',
      eventCategory: userId,
      eventAction: jQuery(this).attr('id'),
      eventLabel: 'focusin'
    });
  });
  jQuery(".trackable").focusout(function(){
    ga('send', {
      hitType: 'event',
      eventCategory: userId,
      eventAction: jQuery(this).attr('id'),
      eventLabel: 'focusout'
    });
  });
  jQuery(".next_6").click(function(){
    jQuery(".borderColors").find("input").val(uuidv4());
  });
});

function gigConnectFields(source) {
  var inputs = jQuery(source).find("input");
  if (inputs.length > 0) {
    inputs.each(function(){
      var option = this;
      var parentElement = jQuery(this).parent().parent();
      var fieldValue = jQuery(option).val();
      var matches = fieldValue.match(/{local:(.*?)}/);
      if (matches.length > 1) {
        var field = matches.pop();
        var fieldQuery = "." + field + " input";
        var fieldObject = jQuery(fieldQuery);
        var fieldValue = "";
        if (fieldObject.length > 0) {
          fieldValue = fieldObject.val();
          jQuery(option).val(fieldValue);
          jQuery("label[for='" + option.id + "']").contents().last().replaceWith(" " + fieldValue);
        }
        if (fieldValue == "") {
          parentElement.hide();
        } else {
          parentElement.show();
        }
        jQuery(document).on("input", fieldQuery, function() {
          var fieldObject = jQuery(fieldQuery);
          var fieldValue = fieldObject.val();
          jQuery(option).val(fieldValue);
          jQuery("label[for='" + option.id + "']").contents().last().replaceWith(" " + fieldValue);
          if (fieldValue == "") {
            parentElement.hide();
          } else {
            parentElement.show();
          }
        });
      }
    });  
  }
}

function uuidv4() {
  return 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) {
    var r = Math.random() * 16 | 0, v = c == 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8);
    return v.toString(16);
  });
}
</script>

config.default:
Thanks!

Thanks. With the configuration provided, we will start to create a new crowd market. Our goal with our system is that you can start a crowd market just by configuring and setting some variables in a form. Now we want to hear from you about your experience using our system.

Feedback

Please complete the following questions about your experience customizing your crowd marketplace
